description:
A better Tabletop Terrain Tutorial, where is show similar techniques: https://youtu.be/Vt_84qE7QDQ. In this video, I show you how to craft cheap miniature castle walls for tabletop games such as D&D.
↓↓ Check out the Super Interesting Links↓↓

title: Crafting Miniature Castle Walls (Terrain for D&D, Warhammer)
